  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4517</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sport</string>
            <string language="es">Deportes</string>
            <string language="ga">Spórt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esporte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αθλητισμός</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson based on converation about sports and extra activities which will help the pupils learn the new material.</string>
            <string language="es">Esta lección basada en la conversación sobre deportes y actividades extras ayudará a los alumnos a aprender el material nuevo.</string>
            <string language="ga">Is éard atá sa cheacht seo ná ceacht comhrá bunaithe ar théama an spóirt agus gníomhaíochtaí breise a chabhróidh leis na daltaí an t-ábhar nua fhoghlaim.</string>
          </description>
          <language>ga</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Irish</string>
            <string language="es">Irlandés</string>
            <string language="ga">Gaeilge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Speaking</string>
            <string language="es">Idioma hablado. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Labhairt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Plean Ceachta</string>
            <string language="ga">Lesson Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion basiert auf converation über Sport 
und Extraaktivitäten, die den Schülern helfen, das neue Material zu 
erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon basée sur le converation au sujet 
des sports et des activités supplémentaires qui aideront les 
élèves à apprendre le nouveau matériel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição baseada no converation sobre os 
esportes e as atividades extra que ajudarão aos alunos aprender o 
material novo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione basata sul converation circa gli 
sport e le attività supplementari che aiuteranno gli allievi ad 
imparare il nuovo materiale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα βασισμένο στο converation για τον 
αθλητισμό και τις πρόσθετες δραστηριότητες που θα βοηθήσουν τους 
μαθητές να μάθουν το νέο υλικό.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Irisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprechen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
